description: This is a great game and it just came out at the August 2023. It’s a first person shooter (Halo-like) but not as good with the graphics. I have a new fast and modern computer that is just a few months old but I don’t have a high end gaming card that is what most modern games take today. This is the only way to go. I hope it becomes very popular.
Anywhere betwwen 30sec to a few mins, the game will just randomly crash with no error version 1.71.6. Bummer, this looks promising.
You should really try this game! It's awesome!
